title: 20 min Yoga for Flexibility - Sweet Release Feel Good Flow
description:
If you've got flexibility goals this class will help you get there! 20 min yummy intermediate yoga.
❤️ Try my mobile app to get exclusive content! ❤️📱 👉 http://bit.ly/ytmobileapp
🛍️ SHOP MY MERCHANDISE, BOOKS & ONLINE COURSES 🧘👉 https://bit.ly/ywkshop

Welcome, thank you so much for joining my in this 20 minute vinyasa flow yoga class for flexibility. This is an intermediate class which focuses on stretching your body from head to toe to improve mobility and get you feeling really good. We'll have a mix of seated and standing poses to stretch our your hips, hamstrings, shoulders and back muscles. You should feel really good by the end.

Looking for a class you can do every day to increase your flexibility and stretch your entire body? This is it! Ideal for those of you who are short on time but want a well rounded full body practice.

No props are required so when you're ready, just meet me on your mat and let's flow together!


✅ SUBSCRIBE TO SUPPORT FREE YOGA ON THE INTERNET  http://bit.ly/ywkassandra
🔔 Don’t forget to click on the bell to turn on post notifications!

Thanks for watching,
Kassandra

comments: I want to thank everyone for your kind words of support with Cleo's passing. It's been a hard week but I'm doing better. I filmed this class a few weeks before she died and have found it hard to get in front of the camera again, but I'm going to try and create a fall equinox flow for you for next week. Enjoy this flexibility flow and thank you all again so much. xx
I loved this sequence and feel so good in my body after just 20 minutes! Was perfect to fit in while my baby naps. Thank you Kassandra
Crazy how this was 20 minutes. I enjoyed it so much, it felt like 5. Thank you 🙏
I LOVE when you do voice-overs! So soothing and it feels like I'm doing a live class with you!
This is a great one first thing in the morning! Thank you.
